mapper.select: select m.uuid as uuid, m.username as username, m.message as message, m.date as date, case WHEN l.likeduser is null then 0 else 1 end as liked from (select * from messages where username in (select friend from friends where user=#{username}) or username=#{username}) as m left join (select * from likes where likeduser=#{username}) as l on m.uuid = l.uuid order by date DESC
select * from messages where username=#{username} order BY date DESC
